author: customer
text: Customer service took forever  and the return policy is such a hassle. The Real Real sent me the wrong item. When I tried to return it, the customer service rep makes you jump through so many hoops and answer so many questions- it was super inconvenient and not easy at all. You have to prove that an item they sent you is wrong by taking pictures and uploading them to the site chat.  The website pictures of what you think you're buying don't actually match the item they send you (this happened twice). Also they will charge you a 12$ Return service charge for luxury item, even when the item description doesn't match the website description or the item they send is wrong. For a luxury service/retail store, it has not been a good experience for the 3 items I bought and then subsequently returned all 3.

author: Vanessa
text: While my bag came on time, I feel like it was not accurately described (or described at all for that matter) on the website, and it’s hard to tell if you will like a bag just from the photos. I didn’t realize the bag I bought had a rubber base on the bottom. It was the same color as the leather so it was impossible to tell by looking at it online, and the base was not mentioned in a description on the website. It’s a bummer that I can’t return it. Will not be shopping from here again.
title: Misleading photos and horrible return policy

author: Terry
text:
I am very frustrated right now with an order I have placed twice for the same Chanel Boy Wallet and both times the orders have been cancelled due to inventory issues. The first one was cancelled but then showed up as available so I bought it again. The second order (which was just cancelled today), I chatted with a CSR yesterday who assured me that it had been batched at the warehouse and that I would receive it tomorrow. I then got an email this a.m. that it was cancelled AGAIN. I called and spoke with a CSR who told me I just need to add it to my favorites and watch for it to appear again...Not only did I miss out on other wallets while waiting for this one to ship (twice) but I also missed the sale that was going on at the time of purchase.

I will say that I did purchase two other items that shipped and were received fine. So I guess it's 50/50 for me on The Real Real right now hence the 3 star rating
